changeSet.author: timler
changeSet.comment: This change set migrates the ComponentStatusChangeReason table from an long primary key to a UUID of type BINARY(16).
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE ComponentStatusChangeReason ADD id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER id;

ALTER TABLE ComponentStatusChangeReason_AUD ADD id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER id;

ALTER TABLE ComponentStatusChange_AUD ADD statusChangeReason_id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(statusChangeReason_id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(statusChangeReason_id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(statusChangeReason_id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(statusChangeReason_id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(statusChangeReason_id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER statusChangeReason_id;

ALTER TABLE ComponentStatusChange ADD statusChangeReason_id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(statusChangeReason_id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(statusChangeReason_id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(statusChangeReason_id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(statusChangeReason_id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(statusChangeReason_id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER statusChangeReason_id;

UPDATE ComponentStatusChangeReason_AUD AS updateTable LEFT JOIN ComponentStatusChangeReason AS joinTable ON (updateTable.id_temp = joinTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.id = joinTable.id WHERE joinTable.id IS NOT null;

DELETE ComponentStatusChangeReason_AUD FROM ComponentStatusChangeReason_AUD LEFT JOIN ComponentStatusChangeReason AS joinTable ON (ComponentStatusChangeReason_AUD.id = joinTable.id) WHERE joinTable.id IS null

UPDATE ComponentStatusChange AS updateTable LEFT JOIN ComponentStatusChangeReason AS joinedTable ON (updateTable.statusChangeReason_id_temp = joinedTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.statusChangeReason_id = joinedTable.id WHERE joinedTable.id IS NOT null;

UPDATE ComponentStatusChange_AUD AS updateTable LEFT JOIN ComponentStatusChangeReason AS joinedTable ON (updateTable.statusChangeReason_id_temp = joinedTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.statusChangeReason_id = joinedTable.id WHERE joinedTable.id IS NOT null;
